org.jboss.aerogear.controller.router.rest.pagination

Class WebLinking

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.aerogear.controller.router.rest.pagination.WebLinking

  • public class WebLinking
extends Object
    WebLinking provides support for generating the HTTP response header in accordance to Web Linking.
